candidates.why: Same workflow/tools family; Bash-driven analysis + gating; strong error handling patterns; writes artifacts under .workflow/active/{session}/.
Direct orchestrator that calls /workflow:tools:tdd-coverage-analysis and consumes its artifacts; defines expected output contract.
Produces standardized .workflow/active/{session}/.process artifacts and includes detection-first flow; tool surface differs (Task/Glob).
Test/coverage-related analysis workflows and structured reporting; uses external LLM tooling patterns not needed here.
Shows session-scoped artifact conventions under .workflow/active and tool orchestration patterns; tool surface differs (Task/Glob).

selected.why: Closest match for a Bash-only workflow tool command that runs checks, emits structured artifacts, and documents clear failure modes.
